text: Christopher Mark Nineham (born June 1962) is a British political activist. He is a founder member of the Stop the War Coalition. He is the National Officer and Deputy Chair of the Stop the War Coalition in the UK. He has worked with Jeremy Corbyn within the organization from 2011 to 2015. He played an important role in creating the 15 February 2003 anti-war protest against the invasion of Iraq. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:British activists
title: Chris Nineham
